snippet: An official index showed a drop in growth for April, mirroring a report from the British bank HSBC.
abstract: Official index shows growth in mainland Chinese manufacturing sector unexpectedly slowed in April as new export orders fell; data raises fresh doubts on strength of economy after disappointing first quarter; purchasing managers' index fell to 50.6 in April from an 11-month high in March of 50.9.
lead_paragraph: An official index showed a drop in growth for April, mirroring a report from the British bank HSBC.

headline.seo: China Data Confirm Slowdown in Factories
headline.main: China Data Confirm Slowdown in Factories
headline.print_headline: China Data Confirms Slowdown in Factories
